      Returns:
      - true if it worked

      runs all the methods in the right order.

    • numberCard

      public void numberCard​(Card card)
      Parameters:
      card - - card that the current player wants to play.

    • wild

      public void wild​(Card card)
      Parameters:
      card - - receives a card and puts it on the PlayDeck. Wild color should be changed to the color that is chosen by the player.

    • wildDrawFour

      public void wildDrawFour​(Card card)
      Parameters:
      card - - receives a card and puts it on the PlayDeck. Forces the next player to get 4 cards and changes color of the card to the chosen one.

    • drawTwo

      public void drawTwo​(Card card)
      Parameters:
      card - - receives a card and puts it on the PlayDeck. Forces the next player to get 2 cards.

    • skip

      public void skip​(Card card)
      Parameters:
      card - - receives a card and puts it on the PlayDeck. Skips the next Player. (currentPlayer)

    • reverse

      public void reverse​(Card card)
      Parameters:
      card - - receives a card and puts it on the PlayDeck. Changes the Direction.

    • reshuffle

      public DrawDeck reshuffle()
      Shuffles the playDeck minus one and converts it to the drawDeck.

    • readInput

      public java.lang.String readInput()
      Returns:
      Just reads the commandLine input. Not to be tested. Java methods only.
